info.name: AgentGarage - n8n Training Workflows
info.description:
Complete collection of training workflow endpoints for the AgentGarage LLM automation exercise.

This collection includes all 9 training workflows:
1. User Story Creator (Original)
2. Manager Agent (Original)
3. Code Review Assistant
4. Gherkin Generator
5. Commit Message Improver
6. PR Description Generator
7. Test Case Generator
8. Release Notes Generator
9. Bug Triage Assistant

Setup:
1. Ensure AgentGarage is running: make start
2. Import this collection into Postman
3. Use the examples or create your own requests
4. Check the shared/ folder for sample data

Base URL: http://localhost:5678

request.description:
Converts rough commit messages into Conventional Commits format.

**Training workflow** - Learn Git best practices automation.

Conventional Commits Format:
- feat: New feature
- fix: Bug fix
- docs: Documentation
- style: Formatting
- refactor: Code restructuring
- test: Tests
- chore: Maintenance
